nhc_headline: ...BERYL FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE AGAIN BEFORE LANDFALL... ...HURRICANE AND STORM SURGE WARNINGS REMAIN IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS  OF THE TEXAS COAST...
summary:
...BERYL FORECAST TO BECOME A HURRICANE AGAIN BEFORE LANDFALL... ...HURRICANE AND STORM SURGE WARNINGS REMAIN IN EFFECT FOR PORTIONS  OF THE TEXAS COAST...
 As of 1:00 AM CDT Sun Jul 7
 the center of Beryl was located near 24.9, -94.3
 with movement NW at 13 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 995 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 60 mph.
